metadata.description: Get ready for the most earth-shattering, world-destroying, insurance-rate hiking event in Marvel history since the last one! Wyatt Cenac and Elliott Kalan of “The Daily Show” lead a cavalcade of comedy’s finest minds to answer the questions about the Marvel Universe you were ashamed to ask! The Marvel U will be rocked down to its spandex-wearing core! Be ashamed. Be VERY ashamed!
metadata.name: Shame Itself
